actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to modify the tax treatment of long-term contracts with the Federal Government.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to modify income tax regulations relating to accounting for long-term contracts to provide that: (1) the amount includible in gross income with respect to any Federal long-term contract shall not be less than a certain amount; and (2) the completed contract method may not be used with respect to Federal long-term contracts. Defines "Federal long-term contract" as any long-term contract: (1) to which the United States (or any agency or instrumentality thereof) is a party; or (2) which is a subcontract to such a contract.

titles.title: A bill to modify the tax treatment of long-term contracts with the Federal Government.
